fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Resurrect any non-Twilight player at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
You can only do this twice
You may disguise your revival as having been done by any other role of your choice
After you revive someone, if Edward is alive, he can attack three players the next time he is able to.
After you revive someone, if Jacob is alive, he can attack two players the next time he is able to.
After both revivals, if no Renesmee is alive, your role becomes Renesmee
Vampire Fixation: Whoever you revive will receive a Powerful Attack two nights later

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Take out all who disturb this terrible romance
